CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This π-π stacking distance of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was 3.64 Å , slightly lower than that of PDTP - DTDPP(EH) ( 3.74 Å ) , which suggests that the butyl group in DPP segment is better for the close π-π stacking of the polymer backbones compared to the bulkier 2-ethylhexyl group.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| DTDPP(EH) |

In this paragraph, the three material names are "PDTP", "DTDPP(Bu)", and "DTDPP(EH)".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| DTDPP(EH) |

In this paragraph, the three material names are "PDTP", "DTDPP(Bu)", and "DTDPP(EH)". The other term "butyl group" and "2-ethylhexyl group" are not material names, but rather descriptors of parts of the materials.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This π-π stacking distance of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was 3.64 Å , slightly lower than that of PDTP - DTDPP(EH) ( 3.74 Å ) , which suggests that the butyl group in DPP segment is better for the close π-π stacking of the polymer backbones compared to the bulkier 2-ethylhexyl group.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| π-π stacking distance |
| 3.64 Å |
| 3.74 Å |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "π-π stacking distance", "3.64 Å", and "3.74 Å". These entities are related to the measurement of the distance between the π-π systems in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP-DTDPP(EH) compounds. The values "3.64 Å" and "3.74 Å" are specific measurements of this distance, while "π-π stacking distance" is the general term used to describe this property.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| π-π stacking distance |

The only clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "π-π stacking distance". This term refers to a specific property of a material, namely the distance between the π-π systems in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP-DTDPP(EH) compounds. The other entities in the paragraph, "3.64 Å" and "3.74 Å", are specific measurements of this property, but they do not clearly refer to a material property on their own. Therefore, they have been excluded from the list.
